channel.title: RuneKit - A Runescape Toolkit -Beta 1.5 {UPDATED!}
channel.description:
[b]UPDATED! -Some bug fixes plus Game Play Timer! Also, you now have to INSTALL RuneKit, don't worry, it's still a small file.[/b]
This is my very first Visual Basic project!
I just learned VB two days ago (October 14) my friend taught me how to make programs and I practiced making basic applications for about an hour then I started to make this program :)
There barely is any features at the moment but that's because I just started making the program yesterday :P
So far I've made a basic web browser and a textpad program. Both still have some bugs (mostly the textpad).
The client also has a quick uid deletion thing and has a link box (of course this site is in the list :P)
I'm looking for some beta testers and maybe some ideas for features that I can add.
Download links: [url=http://www.megaupload.com/?d=3VC32NLL]Download Installer via Megaupload[/url]
- I would've made a RapidShare link, but the site isn't working for me right now.
Please report any bugs to: gamer4ev3r@yahoo.com
~Dizzy :cool:

item.title: RuneKit - A Runescape Toolkit -Beta 1.5 {UPDATED!}
item.dc:creator: @Dizzy Dizzy
item.description:
@Dizzy wrote:

The program doesn’t freeze when you up Runescape because I’ve runned many tests before I released it, it must be something with your computer maybe.
And I’m going to change the “client” part. Also, the world switcher has been built, all that’s needed left is to complete the list of worlds then I’ll release the version with the world switcher.

Read full topic
